languages.text: "Я не участвовал ни в какой краже солнца, {name}. Но могу ли я утверждать, что это не дело рук кабалитов Опустошительной бури, ведомых другим предводителем?" {n}Маражай морщится.{/n} "Нет. Я не отвечаю за Иремерисс и ее прихвостней".

"I had no part in the stealing of any sun, {name}. But can I guarantee that it was not the work of Kabalites acting on the orders of other leaders within the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Marazhai frowns.{/n} "No. I cannot speak for Yremeryss and her minions."
languages.original_text: "Я не участвовал ни в какой краже солнца, {name}. Но могу ли я утверждать, что это не дело рук кабалитов Опустошительной бури, ведомых другим предводителем?" {n}Маражай морщится.{/n} "Нет. Я не отвечаю за Иремерисс и ее прихвостней".

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I had no part in the stealing of any sun, {name}. But can I guarantee that it was not the work of Kabalites acting on the orders of other leaders within the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Marazhai frowns.{/n} "No. I cannot speak for Yremeryss and her minions."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I had no part in the stealing of any sun, {name}. But can I guarantee that it was not the work of Kabalites acting on the orders of other leaders within the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Marazhai frowns.{/n} "No. I cannot speak for Yremeryss and her minions."

traits.locale_text: "I had no part in the stealing of any sun, {name}. But can I guarantee that it was not the work of Kabalites acting on the orders of other leaders within the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Marazhai frowns.{/n} "No. I cannot speak for Yremeryss and her minions."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «No fui partícipe del robo de ningún sol, {name}. Pero si lo que me preguntas es si puedo garantizar que no fuera obra de Kabalista siguiendo órdenes de otros líderes de la Tempestad Asoladora...». {n}Marazhai frunce el ceño.{/n} «No. No puedo hablar en nombre de Yremeryss y sus secuaces».
languages.original_text: "I had no part in the stealing of any sun, {name}. But can I guarantee that it was not the work of Kabalites acting on the orders of other leaders within the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Marazhai frowns.{/n} "No. I cannot speak for Yremeryss and her minions."

traits.locale_text: «No fui partícipe del robo de ningún sol, {name}. Pero si lo que me preguntas es si puedo garantizar que no fuera obra de Kabalista siguiendo órdenes de otros líderes de la Tempestad Asoladora...». {n}Marazhai frunce el ceño.{/n} «No. No puedo hablar en nombre de Yremeryss y sus secuaces».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “那颗恒星的消失和我没有任何关系，{name}。不过，说不定是狂风阴谋团其他的指挥官下的命令？这我可就说不好了。”{n}玛拉斋皱起了眉头。{/n}“不，我没法保证这件事情不是伊芮梅莉斯和她那群爪牙干的。”
languages.original_text: "I had no part in the stealing of any sun, {name}. But can I guarantee that it was not the work of Kabalites acting on the orders of other leaders within the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Marazhai frowns.{/n} "No. I cannot speak for Yremeryss and her minions."

traits.locale_text: “那颗恒星的消失和我没有任何关系，{name}。不过，说不定是狂风阴谋团其他的指挥官下的命令？这我可就说不好了。”{n}玛拉斋皱起了眉头。{/n}“不，我没法保证这件事情不是伊芮梅莉斯和她那群爪牙干的。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「俺は太陽を盗むことに関与していないぜ、{name}。だが、略奪の嵐の他の指導者の命を受けたカバライトの仕業ではないと言い切れるかと問われると」{n}マラズハイは眉をひそめた。{/n}「いいや。イレメリスとその手下のことは分からない」
languages.original_text: "I had no part in the stealing of any sun, {name}. But can I guarantee that it was not the work of Kabalites acting on the orders of other leaders within the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Marazhai frowns.{/n} "No. I cannot speak for Yremeryss and her minions."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は太陽を盗むことに関与していないぜ、{name}。だが、略奪の嵐の他の指導者の命を受けたカバライトの仕業ではないと言い切れるかと問われると」{n}マラズハイは眉をひそめた。{/n}「いいや。イレメリスとその手下のことは分からない」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'ai jamais volé le moindre soleil, {name}, mais de là à vous assurer que ce n'était pas l'œuvre de Kabalites à la solde d'autres chefs de la Tempête ravageuse ? » {n}Marazhai se renfrogne.{/n} « Non. Je n'irais pas jusqu'à me porter garant d'Yremeryss et de ses sbires. »
languages.original_text: "I had no part in the stealing of any sun, {name}. But can I guarantee that it was not the work of Kabalites acting on the orders of other leaders within the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Marazhai frowns.{/n} "No. I cannot speak for Yremeryss and her minions."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai jamais volé le moindre soleil, {name}, mais de là à vous assurer que ce n'était pas l'œuvre de Kabalites à la solde d'autres chefs de la Tempête ravageuse ? » {n}Marazhai se renfrogne.{/n} « Non. Je n'irais pas jusqu'à me porter garant d'Yremeryss et de ses sbires. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hatte nichts mit dem Diebstahl einer Sonne zu tun, {name}. Doch kann ich garantieren, dass es nicht das Werk eines Mitglieds einer Kabale war, das auf den Befehl anderer Anführer innerhalb des plündernden Sturms gehandelt hat?" {n}Marazhai runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Nein. Ich kann nicht für Yremeryss und ihre Schergen sprechen."
languages.original_text: "I had no part in the stealing of any sun, {name}. But can I guarantee that it was not the work of Kabalites acting on the orders of other leaders within the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Marazhai frowns.{/n} "No. I cannot speak for Yremeryss and her minions."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte nichts mit dem Diebstahl einer Sonne zu tun, {name}. Doch kann ich garantieren, dass es nicht das Werk eines Mitglieds einer Kabale war, das auf den Befehl anderer Anführer innerhalb des plündernden Sturms gehandelt hat?" {n}Marazhai runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Nein. Ich kann nicht für Yremeryss und ihre Schergen sprechen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "I had no part in the stealing of any sun, . But can I guarantee that it was not the work of Kabalites acting on the orders of other leaders within the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Marazhai frowns.{/n} "No. I cannot speak for Yremeryss and her minions."

languages.text: "Ben güneş müneş çalmadım {name}. Ancak bunun Müfteris Kasırga bünyesindeki başka önderlerden emir alan Kabalistlerin işi olmadığını garanti edebilir miyim?" {n}Marazhai, yüzünü ekşitiyor.{/n} "Edemem. Yremeryss ve yardakçıları, ne iş peşindedir bilemem."
languages.original_text: "I had no part in the stealing of any sun, {name}. But can I guarantee that it was not the work of Kabalites acting on the orders of other leaders within the Reaving Tempest?" {n}Marazhai frowns.{/n} "No. I cannot speak for Yremeryss and her minions."

traits.locale_text: "Ben güneş müneş çalmadım {name}. Ancak bunun Müfteris Kasırga bünyesindeki başka önderlerden emir alan Kabalistlerin işi olmadığını garanti edebilir miyim?" {n}Marazhai yüzünü ekşitiyor.{/n} "Edemem. Yremeryss ve yardakçıları, ne iş peşindedir bilemem."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
